casename: Loh Ah Kow v Public Prosecutor

tags-parsed: Criminal Law/Offences/Gambling/Common gaming house/Only one of many rooms on premises used for gambling/Whether that one room constitutes 'place'/s 2(1) Common Gaming Houses Act (Cap 49)
